description: This CSS file contains styles for managing themes (light and dark) and layout for a React application named 'tic-tac-toe'. It defines CSS variables for theme colors, styles for the main application container, headers, links, and button interactions.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centered text and background color based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application styled for theme and layout with flexbox.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styled according to the theme, with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggle between light and dark themes, styled for accessibility and interaction.
